{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-620 |revision=B1E |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/16/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-N22U |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2DIR615G1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640 |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6IH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://dlink.ru/ru/products/5/1357.html Product page (RU)]
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=87019 DIR-620 Based RT-3052F - DD-WRT Forums]
The [http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Router/DIR-620/Description/RevA/0_0_3/DIR-620_QIG_swv0.0.3_EN.pdf Rev. A1] manual states the default settings as follows.. *Default IP: 192.168.0.1 *Default user: admin *Default pass: admin *Default SSID: DIR-620
See also [[D-Link DIR-620]]..
==Images== :(mirrored from the DD-WRT forum post above) <gallery> File:DIR-620 rev B1 board.jpg|board top File:DIR-620 rev B1 SoC.jpg|RT3052 WiSoC </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
